Listrik Padam saat Ombudsman Ungkap Hasil Investigasi PLN
07 Nov 2019, 13:44 by ANTARA, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi. (Istockphoto/Ruslan Danyliuk)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Konferensi pers Ombudsman hari ini mengenai hasil investigasi peristiwa pemadaman listrik massal pada Agustus 2019 lalu, diwarnai insiden listrik padam."Lah, pas ngomong listrik malah lampu pas mati," kata anggota Ombudsman Laode Ida saat menyampaikan hasil investigasi kepada wartawan.Konferensi pers di Gedung Ombudsman RI tetap berlanjut dalam keadaan listrik padam. Pencahayaan dalam ruangan secara dadakan dipasok dari lampu kamera awak media. Sejatinya, konferensi pers akan membicarakan soal temuan hasil investigasi atas blackout massal Agustus 2019 lalu.Di tengah listrik yang padam, selentingan terdengar canda pembicara. Salah satu pembicara menyindir PLN. Dia menyayangkan pemadaman listrik hari ini, padahal kata dia, hasil investigasi belum tentu memaparkan ada kendala PLN.Kantor berita Antara melakukan konfirmasi atas kejadian listrik padam ini. Ternyata listrik padam hanya terjadi di ruang tempat konferensi pers berlangsung. Salah satu petugas Gedung Ombudsman menyimpulkan bahwa ada jaringan kelistrikan gedung yang bermasalah. Ombudsman sendiri dalam konferensi pers tersebut memaparkan bahwa hasil investigasi menemukan ada maladministrasi dalam pemadaman listrik secara massal pada Agustus lalu. Maladministrasi itu di antaranya adalah lalai pengawasan, gardu listrik yang belum tersertifikasi, dan proses pemulihan yang berjalan lama. Listrik di ruang jumpa pers kembali menyala setelah acara konferensi pers selesai. (wis)

Power outages when Ombudsman Reveals PLN Investigation Results
Nov 7 2019, 13:44 by ANTARA, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration. (Istockphoto / Ruslan Danyliuk)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Today's Ombudsman press conference regarding the results of the investigation of the mass blackout event in August 2019, was marked by a blackout incident. reporter. The press conference at the RI Ombudsman Building continued in a state of power outages. Instant lighting in the room is supplied by a media crew camera lamp. In fact, the press conference will discuss the findings of the investigation into the mass blackout in August 2019. In the midst of power outages, the rumor is heard by the speaker. One of the speakers insinuated PLN. He regretted the power outage today, even though he said, the results of the investigation would not necessarily explain PLN's problems. Antara news agency confirmed the power outage incident. It turned out that the electricity went out only in the room where the press conference was taking place. One of the Ombudsman Building officers concluded that there was a problem with the electricity network in the building. The Ombudsman himself in the press conference explained that the results of the investigation found that there was a maladministration in the mass power outage last August. Amongst the administrative aspects were negligent supervision, uncertified power substations, and the long-running recovery process. The electricity in the press conference room came back on after the press conference. (wis)
